RecordVariable.name: Channel ADC02 Label
RecordVariable.description: Label for ADC02. This channel is the Channel Label for the Optical Channel 2.

RecordVariable.name: ADC02 Avg
RecordVariable.description: The Average for Optical Channel 2. (Power Can channel ADC02)

RecordVariable.name: ADC02 NumSamps
RecordVariable.longName: ADC02/ Optical Ch 2 Number of Samples
RecordVariable.description: The Number of Samples for Optical Channel 2. (Power Can channel ADC02)

RecordVariable.name: ADC02 Min
RecordVariable.description: The Minimum for Optical Channel 2. (Power Can channel ADC02)

RecordVariable.name: ADC02 Max
RecordVariable.description: The Maximum for Optical Channel 2. (Power Can ADC02)

RecordVariable.name: ADC02 SD
RecordVariable.description: The Std Dev for Optical Channel 2. (Power Can channel ADC02)

RecordVariable.name: ADC02 Err Flag
RecordVariable.description: The Error Flag Value for Optical Channel 2. (Power Can channel ADC02)
